data.name: lblShortTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a short title for division

data.name: lblParentDivision.Help
data.value: Select a parent division for this division

data.name: lblDivisionTerm.Help
data.value: Select taxonomy term, associated with this division

data.name: lblHomePage.Help
data.value: Specify a home page for this division.

data.name: labelDocumentUrl.Help
data.value: Specify main / regualations document for this division.

data.name: lblWebSite.Help
data.value: A separate website for this division, if available

data.name: labelWebSiteLabel.Help
data.value: Optional label for division website. If not specified, website URL will be used instead.

data.name: lblSecondaryEmail.Help
data.value: Enter the division's secondary email address

data.name: lblLocation.Help
data.value: Enter location of the division, e.g. office and cabinet number

data.name: labelWorkingHours.Help
data.value: Select working hours (schedule) for the division from a list

data.name: labelCustomWorkingHours.Help
data.value: Enter description for custom working hours (schedule) for the division

data.name: labelStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current division should be published on the site.

data.name: labelEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current division should be removed from publication on the site.

data.name: labelIsVirtual.Help
data.value: Check if this division is not intended to have any employees in it and used only to organize other divisions.

data.name: labelHeadPosition.Help
data.value: Select the position which relates to the division head employee (the specific employee will be determined automatically by the system). If you not select a position, then head employee cannot be determined - this leaves the division without a head.
